titles.title: I Know That My Redeemer Lives

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I know that my Redeemer lives, And ever prays for me; A token of His love He gives, A pledge of liberty.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I know that my Redeemer lives, A quick'ning Spirit He; I know eternal life He gives- Amazing grace--to me.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: He wills that I should holy be, What can withstand His will? The counsel of His grace in me He surely shall fulfill.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Jesus, I hang upon Thy word; I steadfastly believe Thou wilt return and claim me, Lord, And to Thyself receive.
